Key Match Events: Holiday matched the Rockets' intensity from the jump
Boston held Houston's offense to just 36.4 percent shooting from the floor, including 27.8 percent from deep
Boston's defense limited Houston to just 30 points in the paint for the game, 21.9 points below their season average
Pre-Game Insights: Mazzulla said of Houston, 'They're physical, they're aggressive, so you have to respond to that'
Mazzulla emphasized the importance of Jrue's aggressiveness on the offensive end
Post-Match Reflections: Mazzulla pointed out how much effort Holiday was giving, running back on defense
Mazzulla said of Porzingis' defense in the second half, 'I thought it was tremendous. For his first game back, I thought he was great. He really helped us, especially defensively.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Boston is 17-2 this season when Holiday scores in double digits and is 46-2 all-time when he scores at least 14 points
Holiday has scored a total of 39 points while shooting 53.8 percent from the field, 52.9 percent from 3-point range, and 100 percent from the free-throw line in the last three games
The Celtics have outscored their opponents by 42 points during Holiday's 92 minutes of action
